attributes.action: Make army adverts/commercials illegal so kids aren't inspired to carry guns...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: One way of doing away with or diminishing gun crime in Britain would be to stop army adverts/commercials which portray the use of guns/military force as positive or to the benefit of the public. If army adverts/commercials were made illegal; kids would not be 'led by example' to assume the use guns was ok...
